思慮分別: (しりょふんべつ) - (yoji) discrete and well-advised judgment; wise and mature judgment; making judgment with prudence
思慮深い: (しりょぶかい) - prudent; thoughtful; discreet
思案: (しあん) - thought; consideration; deliberation; reflection; rumination; pondering
思案に余る: (しあんにあまる) - to be at wit's end; to be at a loss for what to do
思案に暮れる: (しあんにくれる) - to be lost in thought
思案投げ首: (しあんなげくび) - (yoji) being at one's wit's end; being (quite) at a loss (what to do)
思案投首: (しあんなげくび) - (yoji) being at one's wit's end; being (quite) at a loss (what to do)
思案顔: (しあんがお) - pensive (or worried) look on one's face
思考の原理: (しこうのげんり) - principle of thought (logic)
思考停止: (しこうていし) - stopping to think; acting without thinking; following rules without thinking for oneself; inability to think; going blank
思考力: (しこうりょく) - ability to think
思考回路: (しこうかいろ) - patterns of thinking; train of thought
思考様式: (しこうようしき) - way of thinking; thought pattern; thinking pattern
思起す: (おもいおこす) - to recall; to remember
思食す: (おぼしめす) - to think (only used to speak of others); to turn one's attention toward (only used to speak of others)/to have feelings for (only used to speak of others); to honour the target of one's emotions
怠けぐせ: (なまけぐせ) - habit of idleness (laziness); indolence
怠けもの: (なまけもの) - lazy person; lazy fellow; slothful person
怠ける: (なまける) - to be idle/to slacken; to neglect (e.g. one's work)
怠け癖: (なまけぐせ) - habit of idleness (laziness); indolence
怠け者: (なまけもの) - lazy person; lazy fellow; slothful person
怠る: (おこたる) - to be negligent in doing something; to shirk; to be off one's guard
怠業戦術: (たいぎょうせんじゅつ) - (yoji) slowdown strategy; go-slow tactics (of workers in a labor dispute)
急: (kyuu/iso) - hurry , sudden, abrupt, unexpected; urgent, pressing; steep, sharp, precipitous; rapid, swift, fast
急いては事を仕損じる: (せいてはことをしそんじる) - (proverb)  Haste makes waste
急いては事を仕損ずる: (せいてはことをしそんずる) - (proverb) Haste makes waste
急かす: (せかす) - to hurry; to urge on
急がす: (いそがす) - to hurry up; to press on; to hasten
急がせる: (いそがせる) - to hasten (the work); to urge (a person) on
急がば回れ: (いそがばまわれ) - (ant: 善は急げ) more haste, less speed; slow and steady wins the race
急がば廻れ: (いそがばまわれ) - (ant: 善は急げ) more haste, less speed; slow and steady wins the race
急きたてられる: (せきたてられる) - to be hurried; to be hastened; to be hard pressed
急きたてる: (せきたてる) - to hurry (up); to press; to urge on
急きょ: (きゅうきょ) - hurriedly; in a hurry
急き立てる: (せきたてる) - to hurry (up); to press; to urge on
急き込む: (せきこむ) - to sound agitated, hurried, flustered; to be impatient
急ぎ: (いそぎ) - haste; hurry; expedition; speed; dispatch
急ぎ便: (いそぎびん) - (often お急ぎ便) express delivery
急ぎ足: (いそぎあし) - fast pace; quick pace
急ぐ: (いそぐ) - to hurry; to rush; to hasten; to make something happen sooner
急ごしらえ: (きゅうごしらえ) - hastily made; improvised preparation
急な坂: (きゅうなさか) - sudden drop; precipitous slope
急な流れ: (きゅうなながれ) - swiftly running river; rapid stream
急を救う: (きゅうをすくう) - to help (a person) out of danger
急を要する: (きゅうをようする) - urgent; requiring quick (response)
急伸: (きゅうしん) - sudden rise (esp. of stock prices); jump
急信: (きゅうしん) - urgent message; urgent dispatch; urgent despatch
急停車: (きゅうていしゃ) - (coming to a) sudden stop
急先鋒: (きゅうせんぽう) - van (of a movement); vanguard; forefront
急制度: (きゅうせいど) - emergency braking procedure (e.g. during driver training and testing)
急啓: (きゅうけい) - (opening formula of an urgent letter) Dear Sir or Madam
急報: (きゅうほう) - urgent report; urgent message
急場をしのぐ: (きゅうばをしのぐ) - to use a stopgap measure to cope with an emergency
急場を凌ぐ: (きゅうばをしのぐ) - to use a stopgap measure to cope with an emergency
急増: (きゅうぞう) - rapid increase; proliferation; surge; explosion
急変: (きゅうへん) - sudden turn/sudden change; (suddenly occurring) accident/emergency
